cause.description:
Some of use express ourselves through dance, some of use express ourselves through music, and others express ourselves through Graffiti. I think our voices should be heard.
1. Graffiti is an art, and a form of expression.
2. The should allow us to do graffiti because we are going to do it anyway.
3. Tagging stuff is fun.
cause.mission: Get places across america to let us express ourselves legally through graffiti.
cause.name: Graffiti is a must
